title: No, Video of People Raising Pro-BJP Slogans Not From Balochistan
subtitle: Fact Check on Pro-Modi Slogans in Balochistan Viral Video: A viral video with the claim that people in Balochistan raised pro-BJP slogans did the rounds on social media. But, the video was originally from Kashmir.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The video begins with the women joining in for a celebratory chant. On listening closely, the group can be heard saying: “सोफी साहब कदम बढ़ाओ, हम तुम्हारे साथ हैं; नरेंद्र भाई कदम बढ़ाओ, हम तुम्हारे साथ हैं”

Taking cue from the name “Sofi” and the word “BJP”, The Quint ran a search with the two keywords.

The results show that the people in the video were sloganeering for Mr Sofi Yousuf, the state vice president of BJP for Jammu and Kashmir, who is also the party’s Lok Sabha candidate from Anatnag in Kashmir. His twitter handle is @sofi_yousuf.

He can also be seen in the video, although not very clearly.

The next step was to ascertain the location where the video was shot. The Quint searched with the keywords: “Sofi”, “Kashmir” and “BJP”.

The search led us to a video put up by Fast Kashmir where it was clearly stated that the video was of BJP Candidate Sofi Yousuf filing for nomination in South Kashmir's Anantnag.
